column4: i am getting this error: W: Couldn't stat source package list http://bd.archive.ubuntu.com breezy/universe Packages (/var/lib/apt/lists/bd.archive.ubuntu.com_ubuntu_dists_breezy_universe_binary-i386_Packages) - stat (2 No such file or directory)
remove the br from the lines starting with http: while using the command >>sudo nano /etc/apt/sources.list << after that run sudo apt-get update and continue from there
im a newvie.. this looks like some kid of cofig file.. can u give me some easier command, how to update the source list?
the lines start with http://br.archive make them http://archive.
after i tick whatever i need, i generate asource.lst file, and i replace the whole thing with my current file??? thats all? what to with the KEys?
leaving out my cntry code wudnt create trouble?
it is your local country code that is creating the problem at the moment
which is why I said remove it from the file
ure right.. i was thinking that too. the repository that is creating problem is my BD based...
what to do abt the key thing? .. it says something abt installing a GPG key in the first line@
don't worry about it, just get the file in place first
ive got the file.. hot to open it in gedit.. command???
where is the full location of the SOUCE list file???
